question: How do I pronounce these names?
answer: The most appropriate way is to attempt to say the name with your best attempt at an Estuary accent.

question: Your algorithm seems to be a bit of a one trick pony
answer: You're absolutely right. It has only one trick, being able to come up with epic names

question: These are great names, could I have them in German?
answer: German is such a great language that we have no need for a nameatron. Just describe it in about 6 or 7 words and then just stick them all together into one word. Works every time

question: Could I have them in any other language?
answer: No. The complex machine learnt algorithm has taken literally 10 minutes to develop and only works in English
